title: Don Cheadle’s War Machine was almost US Vice President in Avengers: Endgame
text:
Endgame could have had a bigger role for War Machine (Pictures: Rex Features)

War Machine (played by Don Cheadle) was almost the Vice President of the United States in Avengers: Endgame, according to Marvel writers.

Let’s break it down and, warning, there are *spoilers* ahead.

Remember when Avengers: Endgame skipped ahead five years after Thanos killed half of the galaxy’s population in an instant?

Within that time, the surviving Marvel heroes try to keep the world together, but some lose all hope (notably Thor, who turns into a video game-playing, beer-drinking slob).

The finished version of the film we all saw showed War Machine and Wanda Maximoff trying to track down ruthless vigilante, Hawkeye.

And now writers have revealed the five-year gap could’ve been very fruitful for James Rupert ‘Rhodey’ Rhodes (War Machine).

Robert Downey Jr and Don Cheadle in Endgame (Picture: Marvel Studios)

‘I believe that during one draft, in the five-year jump, Rhodey became vice president. Vice President Rhodey,’ Marvel writer Christopher Markus told ComicBook.com.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘We took it out because it didn’t have any story weight.’

When asked if the storyline was being saved for another film down the line, Christopher simply responded: ‘No.

‘If anything, I don’t know what all the streaming shows are, but it feels like they might come off of Endgame in some ways.’

‘But at no point did anybody say, “That’s what we should do, so therefore, sprinkle that in”,’ the film’s writer revealed.

It does make us wonder though, if War Machine was going to be VP, who would’ve been POTUS?

The star-studded Endgame cast celebrated the 11-year anniversary of the first Iron Man movie in May this year.

Robert Downey Jr, who played Iron Man, shared a sweet video of the cast singing a rousing version of ‘happy birthday’.

description: Don Cheadle's character James Rupert 'Rhodey' Rhodes (aka War Machine) was almost United States Vice President in Avengers: Endgame.
